Control Name: REMOTE ACCESS | PROTECTION OF CONFIDENTIALITY / INTEGRITY USING ENCRYPTION
Control Statement: The information system implements cryptographic mechanisms to protect the confidentiality and integrity of remote access sessions.Supplemental Guidance:  The encryption strength of mechanism is selected based on the security categorization of the information. Related controls: SC-8, SC-12, SC-13.
